model module¶

class model.ConvolutionalNN(args=None)¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

subclass of pytorch’s nn.Module class to create a NN with two convolutional layers followed by four fully connected ones. Max-pooling is performed after the conv layers and ReLU is used as an activation funciton. The last layer is a softmax funcitno.

forward(x)¶

defines the forward pass through the NN.
